data.author: Ronny Carr

changelog.release_notes: This release includes some cleanup for Quick View and official support for Pebble 2.
The Bluetooth connection icon was having an identity crisis, and would sometimes pose as a battery. It's better now.

In addition to general improvements and bug fixes, in this release you'll find:
- arrival time is now local to the arrival location
- subtle reminder for upcoming travel with an icon
- muted status bar and location colors while not traveling
Restores support for Pebble Classic and Steel!
Bluetooth and battery alert vibration options.

Version 2.3
About section in settings

Version 2.1
Feature Improvements

Version 2
All new weather! Now includes arrival weather and improved current location weather while not traveling. To view arrival weather, flick your wrist one more time while viewing flight details. And if you didn't know, double flick your wrist to view flight details! You can also select a background color from the settings page in the Pebble phone app.

Version 2.2
About section in settings

Version 2.1
Feature Improvements

Version 2
All new weather! Now includes arrival weather and improved current location weather while not traveling. To view arrival weather, flick your wrist one more time while viewing flight details. And if you didn't know, double flick your wrist to view flight details! You can also select a background color from the settings page in the Pebble phone app.

Version 2.1
Feature Improvements

Version 2
All new weather! Now includes arrival weather and improved current location weather while not traveling. To view arrival weather, flick your wrist one more time while viewing flight details. And if you didn't know, double flick your wrist to view flight details! You can also select a background color from the settings page in the Pebble phone app.

All new weather! Now includes arrival weather and improved current location weather while not traveling. To view arrival weather, flick your wrist one more time while viewing flight details. And if you didn't know, double flick your wrist to view flight details! You can also select a background color from the settings page in the Pebble phone app.
Fixes an issue displaying the correct departure/arrival time under certain circumstances.
Updates to better handle when bluetooth or internet connection is unavailable.

- When disconnected, an icon and vibration will let you know
- Battery level is now displayed as a horizontal bar below the time
- Various bug fixes and improvements
Fixes an issue updating the countdown text.
Weather info now uses your preferred units. This option can be set in Travel's settings. Other general improvements and bug fixes.

data.description:
The watchface for Travel! Flight status at a glance, details with a flick of the wrist.

Travel and the First Class upgrade are required to use this watchface. Tap "more from this developer" below to download Travel.

Travel + First Class
Upgrade Your Travel Experience
============================
Real-time flight status notifications, Priority Access, and the exclusive Departure watchface. One time $2.99 in-app purchase via KiezelPay. Learn more in Travel's settings.

Have a question or need help getting started? Tap "email developer" below.

This product uses the TripIt API but is not endorsed or certified by TripIt. Flight data powered by FlightStatsÂ®. Weather data powered by Dark Sky.
